EmailTemplate.name: Global English - Marketing Communications Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Marketing Communications Request is Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} :
The “ ” follows the DuPont Brand Identity Standards and is approved.
Please work with your advertising agency to upload the artwork in the DuPont Digital Asset Management System (DAM).
Amy J. Hurff DuPont Corporate Communications Brand Specialist 302-996-8361 amy.j.hurff@dupont.com
